DOC.brief_summary: This study is a multicenter, non-randomized, retrospective study to collect long term (5 years post-transplant) clinical outcome data to test whether the results of the noninvasive immune monitoring test strategy performed in the parent study (CTOT-01, NCT00308802) in first six-month post-transplant is predictive of 5-year outcomes. Each center will complete a retrospective chart review for the data on patient survival, graft survival and renal function.
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Multicenter Study to Determine 5-Year Clinical Outcomes in Subjects Previously Enrolled in the CTOT-01 Study
DOC.criteria: Participants previously enrolled in the CTOT01 study. Participants who are at least 5 years posttransplant (+/ 6 months), no later than March 31, 2014. Withdrawal of consent to continue in the CTOT01 study.
